short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let your email recipient knows what currently are you reading. Currently it supports Gmail only

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently Reading for Gmail adds an entry in your existing email signature about what book you are currently reading. To make this extension work you must have a signature set in Gmail preferences.

----------

📚 Discover Your Reading Signature! 💌 Enhance your Gmail experience with our Chrome extension designed exclusively for book enthusiasts and avid readers. Showcase your current book title in your Gmail signature, sparking literary conversations with every email you send! 🌟 

🔎 Simple Book Search: Easily find and select your current read.

📖 Personalize Your Emails: Express your literary identity with every message you send. Let your recipients know what's on your reading list, and connect with fellow book lovers effortlessly.

🎁 A Treat for Bookworms: Stay inspired and engaged with a rotating bookshelf of your favorite reads. Share your literary passions with the world!

🚀 Transform Your Gmail Signature: Elevate your email experience and make your mark in the reading community. Install the extension now and embrace your bookish identity with every email! 💌📚

Visit the home page: https://currentlyreading.adnansiddiqi.me/ to learn more about it.
